div1.p:
PROGRAMME
OF
MISS ANNIE OAKLEY'S
(Of the Wild West Show)
Private Performance
BEFORE THE MEMBERS AND THEIR FRIENDS,

On JUNE 11th, 1887,
AT HALF-PAST ONE O'CLOCK.

1. Short exhibition of Rifle Shooting, small rifle.
2. Shooting Clay Pigeons, first two straight.
3. Pulling the trap herself.
4. Standing back to trap, turning and firing.
5. The snap shot or killing bird close to trap.
6. Shooting double.
7. Picking gun from ground after trap is sprung.
8. Same shot double.
9. Standing 20 feet from the gun, running and firing after the trap is sprung.
10. Holding gun with one hand, throwing ball herself.
11. Throwing two balls herself, breaking both.
12. Throwing ball backwards, picking up gun, and breaking it.
13. Breaking six balls thrown in air in four seconds.
14. Breaking five balls in five seconds, first with rifle, others with shot guns, changing guns three times.*
15. To shoot at 25 Blue Rocks from five traps, standing at 23 yards distance.
*Please take time from first report of gun.
